TopicTitle: Something Funny in the Cupola Capsule

Articles.Content: What's funny about that? Spares are for emergencies only. Bits of metal work just fine unless there is a short or an overload. After all there's thousands of kerbals willing to fill in if Bill should have an "accident".

What's funny about that? Spares are for emergencies only. Bits of metal work just fine unless there is a short or an overload. After all there's thousands of kerbals willing to fill in if Bill should have an "accident".

Not thousands, not millions, not billions, not trillions, not qaudrillions or quintillions, but INFINITY.

I'm loving these new cockpits, I really hope that they will go through all the old IVAs and update them to this level of quality. I used to think that the other command pods were pretty well-filled with stuff, but now they look so empty by comparison...
Now I realize that my dad thinks like a kerbal when trying to fix his car.
This may be referencing the fact that in the Apollo 11 lunar module, Buzz Aldrin accidentally broke the circuit breaker that would arm the ascent engine. They got it to work using the tip of a pen.
